comment.author: 29350288@N06
comment._content: Singers Geraldine Farrar and Enrico Caruso, costumed for their performance in the opera "Julien". They were in the cast for the US debut of Charpentier´s opera at the Met in 1914. Caruso and Farrar were highly regarded, but the opera failed to garner much acclaim, and closed after 5 performances. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Geraldine_Farrar en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Enrico_Caruso en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Julien_(opera)
